person.persName: Nathaniel G. Standley, Sr. (Henderson County, Kentucky, planter)

body.p: Henderson County, Kentucky, planter. Kentucky native. Married to Penila Folden Standley. Father of John T. Standley, Nathaniel G. Standley, Jr., William G. Standley, and George W. Standley. Married Fannie Jenkins Standley on January 9, 1861. Farmer in Henderson County in 1850 and 1860. Owned thirteen enslaved persons in 1850 and twenty in 1860.
